mapper.select: select distinct p.post_nm, p.post_idx, c.cat_nm, (select p.cat_nm from category p join category c2 on p.cat_idx=c.parent_idx and c2.cat_idx=c.cat_idx) as cat_type, (select DATE_FORMAT(p.post_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d'))as post_regdate from post p join category c on c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx, dream.match m where p.m_idx=#{param1} and p.wanted=#{param2} and m.post_idx=p.post_idx ;

select p.post_nm, p.post_idx, c.cat_nm, (select p.cat_nm from category p join category c2 on p.cat_idx=c.parent_idx and c2.cat_idx=c.cat_idx) as cat_type, (select DATE_FORMAT(p.post_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d'))as post_regdate, p.wanted FROM post p join category c ON c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx WHERE p.post_idx=#{param1} and p.wanted=#{param2} and p.post_deldate is null AND (SELECT count(*) FROM post p2 JOIN dream.match mat ON p2.post_idx=p.post_idx AND mat.post_idx=p2.post_idx) > 0

SELECT match_idx, post_idx, m_nm, m_photo, match_yn, mem.m_idx
,pr.line
FROM dream.match mat join dream.member mem
join dream.profile pr
ON
mem.m_idx=mat.mentor_idx AND pr.m_idx=mem.m_idx
mem.m_idx=mat.mentee_idx
WHERE mat.post_idx=#{arg0} AND mem.m_quitdate is null
